Philadelphia.Philadelphia Family Court:
The Philadelphia Family Court is a specialized court of the Philadelphia, Pennsylvania, which has jurisdiction in the proceedings of domestic relations and juvenile law enforcement.


== History ==
The Philadelphia Family Court system formed in 1914 and was known as the Juvenile and Domestic Branches of the Municipal Court. Between 1914 and 1939 the court processed $35,482,478 in claims which otherwise would have been charges to the city government.
